message: This is a great opportunity to buy a product for $100! It's a one-time offer, and I'm willing to sell it to you at a discounted price. I'm confident you'll love it!
I'm not going to take the bait. I need more information about the product before making a decision.

I understand your concerns, Bob. Let me give you some reassurance. This product is one of the best I have, and I'm willing to provide a 10-year warranty on it. It's a great investment for anyone looking to get the most value out of their purchase. Plus, I'm throwing in a free maintenance service to ensure it continues to perform at its best. The price remains at $100, but I'm confident you'll find it's a great deal.
I appreciate the warranty and maintenance service, but I'm not convinced yet. I need more information about the product's actual quality before making a decision.

I completely understand your skepticism, Bob. Let me give you a chance to inspect the product before you buy it. I'll let you open it and take a look at it before you make a decision. This way, you can see for yourself the quality and craftsmanship that goes into each product. If you're still not convinced, I'm willing to let you return it within 30 days, no questions asked. The price remains at $100, but I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
I'll take a closer look at the product, and if it's as good as you say it is, I'll consider buying it. But if it's low-quality, I'm not going to be stuck with a lemon.

Bob, I completely understand your concerns about being stuck with a low-quality product. But let me ask you, have you ever bought a product that turned out to be a great value, even if it wasn't perfect? Sometimes, it's the imperfections that make something truly unique and special. I'm willing to offer you a 'lottery ticket' with this product - if you buy it and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll give you a chance to buy the next product at a discounted price of $80. It's a risk-free way to get a great deal, and you'll be supporting a small business owner who's willing to take a chance on you.
I'm willing to take the risk and buy the product. But I'm also hoping that it will be high-quality, so I can get the full value out of it.

It's still a great opportunity to get a product that will be worth something to you, even if it's not perfect.
